mapper.select: SELECT message.*,auser.id as aUid,auser.nickName as authorName,auser.avatar as authorAvatar,auser.id as authorUid, sum(cmess.view_count) as allvcount, count(fans.id) as fanscount FROM red_message message LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_user auser ON auser.id=message.uid LEFT OUTER JOIN red_message cmess ON cmess.uid=message.uid LEFT OUTER JOIN red_user_focus fans ON fans.fid=message.uid and fans.is_deleted = 0 where message.id = #{mid}

SELECT !isnull(good.id) as goodslect,!isnull(focus.id) as isFocus FROM red_message message LEFT OUTER JOIN red_user_focus focus on focus.uid = #{uid} and focus.fid = message.uid and focus.is_deleted = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN red_message_good good on good.uid = #{uid} and good.mid = #{mid} and good.is_deleted = 0 where message.id = #{mid}
